languages.text: "Когда-то на заре моей службы я выполнял обязанности секретаря, проводившего у местного отделения Адептус Администратум логистические отчеты. Ваши, Мастер Печатей, слова вызывают воспоминания, которым я совсем, совсем не рад".

"There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то на заре моей службы я выполнял обязанности секретаря, проводившего у местного отделения Адептус Администратум логистические отчеты. Ваши, Мастер Печатей, слова вызывают воспоминания, которым я совсем, совсем не рад".

traits.locale_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories which I am not fond of in the slightest."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories which I am not fond of in the slightest."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Il fut un temps, pendant mes premières années de service, où j'exerçais les fonctions de secrétaire chargé des rapports logistiques d'un bureau local de l'Administratum. Vos mots, maîtresse des sceaux, évoquent en moi des réminiscences dont je me serais volontiers passé. »
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: « Il fut un temps, pendant mes premières années de service, où j'exerçais les fonctions de secrétaire chargé des rapports logistiques d'un bureau local de l'Administratum. Vos mots, maître des sceaux, évoquent en moi des réminiscences dont je me serais volontiers passé. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は現役時代、地方のアドミニストラトゥムで物流報告担当の秘書を務めていたことがありますよ。印章長、あなたの言葉を聞いて、あの仕事が嫌いだったことを思い出しました」
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: 「我は現役時代、地方のアドミニストラトゥムで物流報告担当の秘書を務めていたことがありますよ。印章長、あなたの言葉を聞いて、あの仕事が嫌いだったことを思い出しました」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我刚到审判庭没多久的时候，曾在工作区域的内政部办公室担任后勤报告秘书。印章大师，你的话勾起了我一点都不愉快的回忆。”
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: “我刚到审判庭没多久的时候，曾在工作区域的内政部办公室担任后勤报告秘书。印章大师，你的话勾起了我一点都不愉快的回忆。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "In meinen frühen Dienstjahren war ich als Sekretär in einem lokalen Büro des Administratums für Logistikberichte zuständig. Eure Worte, Meister der Siegel, wecken äußerst unerwünschte Erinnerungen."
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: "In meinen frühen Dienstjahren war ich als Sekretär in einem lokalen Büro des Administratums für Logistikberichte zuständig. Eure Worte, Meister der Siegel, wecken äußerst unerwünschte Erinnerungen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Durante mis primeros años de servicio, tuve que ejercer de secretario de logística en una oficina local del Administratum. Maestra de Sellos, sus palabras me traen unos recuerdos que preferiría poder olvidar por completo».
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: «Durante mis primeros años de servicio, tuve que ejercer de secretario de logística en una oficina local del Administratum. Maestra de Sellos, sus palabras me traen unos recuerdos que preferiría poder olvidar por completo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Gençliğimde, yerel bir Administratum ofisinin lojistik raporlarından sorumlu yazmanı olarak görevimi yerine getirdiğim bir dönem olmuştu. Söylediklerinizle pek nahoş anılarım canlandı Mühür Üstadı."
languages.original_text: "There was a time during my earlier years of service when I performed the duties of a secretary in charge of logistics reports at a local Administratum office. Your words, Master of Seals, bring back memories of which I am not the least bit fond."

traits.locale_text: "Gençliğimde, yerel bir Administratum ofisinin lojistik raporlarından sorumlu yazmanı olarak görevimi yerine getirdiğim bir dönem olmuştu. Söylediklerinizle pek nahoş anılarım canlandı Mühür Üstadı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
